dict.acceptation: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农学；

sent.orig: Water-saving agriculture that earns foreign exchange, orders for agriculture, greenhouse agriculture, green agriculture has become fashionable.
sent.trans: 节水农业、创汇农业、订单农业、棚室农业、绿色农业等如今已成为时尚。

sent.orig: Modern agriculture is a new stage of agriculture development after original agriculture and traditional agriculture.
sent.trans: 现代农业，是继原始农业、传统农业之后的又一个农业发展新阶段。

sent.orig: These systems include three areas, agriculture operation system, agriculture management system and agriculture products mobilization system.
sent.trans: 这些体制包括：农业经营体制、农业管理体制和农产品流通体制三个方面。

sent.orig: Agricultural cent is 3 phase, namely archaic agriculture, latter-day agriculture, contemporary agriculture.
sent.trans: 农业分为三个阶段，即古代农业、近代农业、现代农业。

sent.orig: The agriculture of China is experiencing the transition from traditional agriculture to nxxlem Agriculture.
sent.trans: 中国农业正经历着由传统农业到现代农业的转变。
